greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of nonzero digits in representation of A328316(n) in primorial base; Number of distinct prime factors in A328316(1+n).
link: Index entries for sequences related to primorial base
program: A276086(n) = { my(m=1, p=2); while(n, m *= (p^(n%p)); n = n\p; p = nextprime(1+p)); (m); };
A267263(n) = { my(s=0, p=2, d); while(n, d = (n%p); s += !!d; n = (n-d)/p; p = nextprime(1+p)); (s); };
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Oct 14 2019
